snippet: A State Department cable said forces loyal to President Bashar al-Assad of Syria may have used chemical weapons in the city of Homs on Dec. 23, according to a report.
abstract: Report reveals that State Department cable said forces loyal to Pres Bashar al-Assad of Syria may have used chemical weapons in the city of Homs on December 23, 2012, which contrasts with Obama administration saying that it discounted possibility that poison gas had been used.
lead_paragraph: A State Department cable said forces loyal to President Bashar al-Assad of Syria may have used chemical weapons in the city of Homs on Dec. 23, according to a report.

headline.seo: Consulate Said to Support Claim of Syrian Gas Attack
headline.main: Consulate Supported Claim of Syria Gas Attack, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Consulate Supported Claim of Syria Gas Attack, Report Says

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
